Interface IEditFileService<T>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Interface with additional methods for handling collection of entities implementing IEditFile interface.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T>
Implementations: MergedFileService, SelectedFileService 

public interface IEditFileService<T> : IDirectoryService<T>, ICRUDService<T>, IService<T> where T : IEditFile

Type Parameters

T

Class implementing IEditFile interface.

Methods

UpdateTitle(int, string?)

Updates the title.

int UpdateTitle(int id, string? title)

Parameters

id int

The identifier of object to update.

title string

The new title.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated item, or -1, if update failed (for example there are no item with specified id in the collection).
